sqlite.findByAll: SELECT * FROM boardContent ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT ?, ?
sqlite.findbyBoardIdx: SELECT * FROM boardContent WHERE boardIdx = ? ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT ?, ?
sqlite.countByBoardIdx: SELECT count(*) FROM boardContent WHERE idx = ?
sqlite.save: INSERT INTO boardContent (boardIdx, title, content, createDate, hidden) VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?)
sqlite.update: UPDATE boardContent SET title = ?, content = ?, modifyDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where idx = ?
